messages.content: What does the ABConditionNode do for numerical calculations?
ABConditionNode performs simple numerical calculations for switching Latent, specifically, if you enter 0, it will output 2, and all other conditions will output 1.
How does ABConditionNode handle inputs other than 0?
ABConditionNode outputs 1 for all conditions other than inputting 0.
What is the purpose of CharacterCountNode?
CharacterCountNode counts the number of characters in the input text.
CharacterCountNode must use external input to ensure accuracy.
